name: Another Apocalypse
description: Was created for educational purposes only) Almost everything that happens is adjusted to the rhythm of the music.  Player's shooting , big robot jumping (walking is boring) and all explosions to the general beat (bpm) of the track, enemies shooting to a simple randomly generated rhythm pattern based on the general beat. Another uNiQuE feature - after the destruction of the enemy, it explodes and if at that moment you are in the radius of the explosion, you can heal (all explodes because explosions are COOL).
